info.description:
Alright this is a story where you expand the girls from Darker than Black however you want. Now for a few rules.

1. You can expand the girls in any way, no guys though
2. sex is great, lesbian relationships are A/OK as well, no gay though

5. All characters in the story are represented as over 18

Thats it, enjoy and go wild
